Package seng202.team4.model

Class CalculationsTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • seng202.team4.model.CalculationsTest
  • public class CalculationsTest
extends java.lang.Object
    Test whether the calculations class gives the expected result based on the carbon emissions and distance formula.
